The bar chart illustrates the number of trips for a school that generates from children in one country between 1990 and 2010, measured in millions of trips.
Overall, nearly all of the method experience a downward trend while the car passenger's method showed a rapid increase upward throughout the given period.
Car passenger was about 11 million of trips for a school that generate in 2010, being higher than other methods approximately between two and five times in that year whereas it is the least of the trip that generated in 1990. In contrast, walking generates about approximately 12 million trips has used by children in 1990 which is the most adopted method for children as it drastically is thrown away other methods in amount; however, it experienced significantly drops to 6 million in 2010 with approximately 50% drop.
For cycling, bus and its combination method, it also experienced the same phenomenon of dropping in a given period that to approximately between 2 million and 5 million of trips that used by children in 2010 with approximately 40% to 66% drop, compared to 1990's figures respectively.

祼考7.5 writing 6 英文作文5*

//Overall, nearly all of the method experience a downward trend while the car passenger‘s method showed a rapid increase upward throughout the given period.//

用紅字while做分割前後兩部分，前半係現在式，後半過去式，如果前後兩句係同時發生/進行，我建議用返一致時式，讀者會少啲迷感，當然，可能我英文較弱，誤會咗。

另外，showed同while嘅配搭令我有啲迷惑，樓主想講一個時間上持續嘅show?或者可以用is increasing rapidly代替。

另外，increase upward係ielts專用phrase?未見過，唔清楚點用，不過照詞性睇：
//a rapid increase upward//
Increase前面有a，噉increase呢到係名詞。
Rapid放喺increase前面，噉rapid即係描述緊increase嘅形容詞。
但係upward放咗喺increase後面，即係當名詞用？我唔肯定upward有冇呢個用法。假如係作形容詞用，噉我建議放返喺名詞前面。

另外，increase同upward會唔會意思上重複咗？

我都唔係好識英文，剩係識用啲好基本嘅句式，加油。

As compared with the level in 1990, there was a reduction in the number of trips using all modes of transport in 2010, except for car passenger.
While car passenger was the least popular mode of transport with around 4 millions trips in 1990, it became the dominant mode accounting for about 11 millions trips in 2010.

//The bar chart illustrates the number of trips for a school that generates from children in one country between 1990 and 2010//

喺summarising嘅時候應該用咩時式？

我英文差，唔清楚現在式點用。

另外generate都有個疑問，如果係講緊個number of trips，一個死物，會唔會要用被動式？

另外，from children會唔會令人誤會個number係用children做原料？即係旺寶雪條用橙汁做原料噉。
可以點re-write全文

The bar chart illustrates the number of trips generated by the children aged between 5 to 12 years old from 1990 to 2010. The chart shown a range of data of transportation methods collected from pupils’ travel to and from school, the data was analysed in millions of trips per year.

The overall data collected suggested that there is a general reduction in most of the transportation methods when comparing the 1990s’ to 2010s’, with an exception of children being the car passengers. One of the most significant changes in the mode of transportation is pupils travelling by car that has rapidly increased to an approximately 11 million in 2010, in comparison with 4 million in 1990 who travelled by car. The increase of pupils travelling by car is the highest in 2010 compared with different transport method, in contrast it is about 5 times more than cycling in the same year. Whereas walking was more favourable in 1990 given it was the most popular transportation method used, an approximately 12 million of trips was recorded in 1990 compared with 6 million in 2010. The significant drops in number from pupils walking to school from 1990 to 2010 can also be observed in ‘cycling’, ‘walking and bus’ and ‘bus’.

However, the data collected could not be used directly as a comparison dataset when analyse the mode of transportation used between 1990 and 2010. Total number of trips per year recorded in 1990 was approximately 35 million when compared with 2010 of approximately 27 million, and thus the results shown in the chart does not fully reflected to the trend observed.
